mapper.select:
SELECT /* com.at.apcss.fm.fclt.mapper.FcltAtmtcMchnInfoMapper.selectFcltAtmtcMchnInfoRawDataList */ OTI.CRTR_YR , OTI.APC_CD ,(SELECT APC_NM FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD) AS APC_NM
, (SELECT FN_GET_COM_CD_VL_NM('UNTY_CTPV',CTPV_CD) FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = OTI.CRTR_YR ) AS CTPV_NM
, (SELECT X.CD_VL_EXPLN FROM TB_COM_CD_DTL X WHERE 1=1 AND X.CD_ID = 'UNTY_SGG' AND X.APC_CD = '0000' AND X.CD_VL = (SELECT SIGUN_CD FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_PRSN_OTLN WHERE 1=1 AND APC_CD = OTI.APC_CD AND CRTR_YR = OTI.CRTR_YR) ) AS SIGUN_NM
, OTI.SN , OTI.ITEM_CD , OTI.ITEM_NM
, DECODE(SPSD.WBG , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS WBG , DECODE(SPSD.WRHS_BR_QR , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS WRHS_BR_QR , DECODE(SPSD.KSK_TBLT , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS KSK_TBLT , DECODE(SPSD.DPTZ , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS DPTZ , DECODE(SPSD.APM , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS APM , DECODE(SPSD.ELCTRN_WGHT_SORT_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS ELCTRN_WGHT_SORT_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.NDST_BRCK_SORT_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS NDST_BRCK_SORT_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.GRD_RAW_MTR_ATMTC_TRNSF_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS GRD_RAW_MTR_ATMTC_TRNSF_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.DSHBRD , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS DSHBRD , DECODE(SPSD.EMPT_BX_ATMTC_EXHST_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS EMPT_BX_ATMTC_EXHST_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.ATMTC_BX_PCKG_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS ATMTC_BX_PCKG_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.ATMTC_SS_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS ATMTC_SS_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.ATMTC_WRAP_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS ATMTC_WRAP_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.ATMTC_WGHT_CHCK_MCHN , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS ATMTC_WGHT_CHCK_MCHN , DECODE(SPSD.PTZ , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS PTZ , DECODE(SPSD.SPMT_BR_QR , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS SPMT_BR_QR , DECODE(SPSD.TH_AC , '1' , '보유' , '2' , '미보유' , '') AS TH_AC
, SPSD.SPCFCT_CNT , SPSD.SPCFCT_GRP , SPSD.SPCFCT_GRD
FROM TB_TE_APC_OPER_TRMT_ITEM OTI ,TB_TE_APC_SMART_PRPLSN_STTN_DTL SPSD WHERE 1=1 AND OTI.APC_CD = SPSD.APC_CD(+) AND OTI.CRTR_YR = SPSD.CRTR_YR(+) AND OTI.SN = SPSD.SN(+) AND OTI.OGNZ_SE_CD = '2' AND OTI.APC_CD IS NOT NULL AND OTI.SN NOT IN ('4')
AND OTI.CRTR_YR = #{crtrYr}
AND OTI.APC_CD IN (SELECT APC_CD FROM TB_APC_INFO WHERE 1=1
AND CTPV = (SELECT CTPV FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
AND SGG = (SELECT SGG FROM TB_COM_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId})
)
ORDER BY APC_NM , OTI.SN
